text: Roland Allard (4 June 1911 - 11 August 1988) was a French alpine skier. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1988 deaths Category:French male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of France Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Roland Allard
